sentences.en: The reaction of chain scission is first - order reaction.
sentences.cn: 白油的断链为一级反应.

sentences.en: The research on producing 10 - hydroxy decanoic acid by alkaline scission of ricinoleic acid is reviewed.
sentences.cn: 综述了碱热解蓖麻油酸合成10- 羟基 癸酸的开发研究进展.

sentences.en: The results show that chain scission and oxidation occurs in the whole reaction.
sentences.cn: 研究表明,白油在热氧老化过程中主要发生断链和氧化反应.

sentences.en: This derivation is only valid if no chain scission accompanies crosslinking.
sentences.cn: 这一关系式仅适用于交联时不伴有断链发生的情况.

trans.tran_en: the act or an instance of cutting, splitting, or dividing
